SeSpring So Brightening Eye Serum

Brand: SeSpring

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Trehalose, Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Niacinamide, Adenosine, Caffeine, Polyglutamic Ac

ine, Polyglutamic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Allantoin, Arginine, Tocopherol, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polyisobutene, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Sorbitan Oleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Carbomer, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Disodium EDTA.

Directions

um EDTA.

Directions: Apply in a circular motion across the undereye area. Lightly tap into skin with finger. Use after cleansing and toning. For all skin types.

Warnings: For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.
